round_3: FANXI is a watches & jewelry store based in Nanchang, China.
round_4: FANXI is a professional enterprise that specializes in the research and development, as well as marketing of jewelry display and packaging products. Their major products include jewelry displays such as sets, stands, trays, necklaces busts, and cases, aswell as jewelry packaging products such as paper bags, gift boxes, and pouches. They offer a wide range of jewelry boxes, including leather, microfiber, leatherette, paper, velvet, silk, LED light, wooden, and custom model boxes, as also as jewelry cases, bags, and trays. FANXII's goal is to make every piece of jewelry more extraordinary, provide unlimited business opportunities to jewelers, and bring visual feast to customers.
